segments.text: Have you been ever been to Disneyworld ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When I was young , my parents took me to the one in California . I always forget which â€” is that one Disneyland or Disneyworld ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The one in Florida is Disneyworld and the one in California is Disneyland , so you must have been to Disneyland .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . Why do you ask ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I've never been to either so I was thinking of going to Disneyworld for my honeymoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Some time next year . We haven't set the date yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . So what do you think ? Would we have a good time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For the most part , yes . Some of the rides are bit too scary for me , though .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you don't think twice about the rides and go on every ride that you can , you'll have a good time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Even the roller coasters that go through tunnels in the dark ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Even those . It'll be very romantic , I think . You'll have loads of fun .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks for the advice . I'll talk to my fiance about it tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sure he'll love the idea . Just throw yourself into it and you'll enjoy it !
segments.speaker: S2
